sentences.en: Bureaucracy can entangle applications for months.
sentences.cn: 官僚主义会使申请耽搁数月之久。

sentences.en: Bureaucracy can entangle ventures for months.
sentences.cn: 官僚体制会使风险投资搁置好几个月。

sentences.en: Could I but entangle your feet with mt heart ang hold them fast to my breast!
sentences.cn: 但愿能用我的心缠住你的双足,把它们紧紧抱在我胸前!

sentences.en: Could I but entangle your feet with my and hold them fast my breast!
sentences.cn: 但愿我能用我的心系住你的双足,紧抱在胸前!
不要让钓鱼线缠在一起.

sentences.en: Entangle now interrupts channeling spells such as Starfall and Blizzard.
sentences.cn: 纠缠现在可以打断持续性魔法了,例如流星雨和暴风雪.

sentences.en: His tactics were to entangle the opposition in a web of parliamentary procedure.
sentences.cn: 他的策略是使反对派陷入错综复杂的议会程序之中。

sentences.en: How did Alice manage to entangle her hair so badly in the brambles?
sentences.cn: 爱丽丝是怎么把头发死死地缠在野生灌木上的?

sentences.en: How did Mary manage to entangle her hair so badly in the brambles?
sentences.cn: 玛丽的头发缠紧在荆棘上了,她是怎么搞的?

sentences.en: Mining equipment of mineral products: Send, entangle and break to pieces, elute, press one, improve compositions.
sentences.cn: 矿产开采设备: 输送 、 绞碎 、 洗脱 、 压粒 、 提高成份.

sentences.en: The blade of the oar had entangled itself with the strap of her bag.
sentences.cn: 桨叶和她包的带子紧紧缠在了一起。

sentences.en: This group of people entangle to dream of fetch of pilot a ship into a harbour.
sentences.cn: 这群人对工程如痴如醉.这群人对引水魂梦萦.

sentences.en: To entangle or catch ( a rope, for example ).
sentences.cn: 纠结使缠住或绊住 ( 如绳子 )

sentences.en: Youfu as well . Very soon, the two entangle and flop onto the ground.
sentences.cn: 两个人很快嘻嘻哈哈地纠扯在一起, 扑通一声倒在了地上.

words.tran_cn: 纠缠；铁丝网；缠绕物；牵连

trans.tran_cn: 使缠上, 纠缠, 卷入, 连累, 使混乱
trans.tran_en: to involve someone in an argument, a relationship, or a situation that is difficult to escape from

trans.tran_cn: 使纠缠，缠住，使卷入，使陷入，连累，使混乱
trans.tran_en: to involve someone in an argument, a relationship, or a situation that is difficult to escape from
